con:call.name: Request 1
con:call.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:cus="http://www.yota.ru/vox/services/customerProduct" xmlns:core="http://www.roox.ru/products/common/core" xmlns:core1="http://www.yota.ru/vox/domains/common/core"> <soapenv:Header/> <soapenv:Body> <cus:ChangeProductRequest> <!--Optional:--> <core:extension> <!--Zero or more repetitions:--> <core:item>?</core:item> </core:extension> <product id="?"> <accountId>?</accountId> <!--Optional:--> <accumLeft>?</accumLeft> <!--Optional:--> <allowAutoProlong>?</allowAutoProlong> <!--Optional:--> <allowProductChange>?</allowProductChange> <beginDate>?</beginDate> <!--Optional:--> <bundledProductId>?</bundledProductId> <correlationProductId>?</correlationProductId> <!--Optional:--> <cost currencyCode="?"> <core1:amount>?</core1:amount> </cost> <!--Optional:--> <customerId>?</customerId> <!--Zero or more repetitions:--> <dependentProducts>?</dependentProducts> <endDate>?</endDate> <!--Optional:--> <masterProductId>?</masterProductId> <!--Optional:--> <offeringIdToChange>?</offeringIdToChange> <productOfferingId>?</productOfferingId> <!--Optional:--> <regionOfBuying>?</regionOfBuying> <!--Zero or more repetitions:--> <services> <serviceId>?</serviceId> </services> <status>?</status> </product> </cus:ChangeProductRequest> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>
